education.description: I have done my Bachelors degree in computer application from Bangalore University, Bangalore, India. It’s 3 years of regular undergraduate degree course including all the basic subjects of computer application like C, Data Structures,  System Programming, Web programming, Software Engineering, etc.

I have done my Masters degree in computer application from West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata, India. It’s 3 years of regular postgraduate degree course including all the advanced subjects of computer application like Artificial Intelligence, Automata, Advance DBMS, etc.
